title: MCP Stack Helm Chart Values
description: JSON Schema for MCP Stack Helm Chart values.yaml

global.description: Global settings applied across the entire Helm release

imagePullSecrets.description: List of image pull secrets for private registries

nameOverride.description: Short name applied to all resources (optional)

serviceAccount.description: ServiceAccount configuration for all pods in the release

annotations.description: Annotations for the ServiceAccount (e.g., IRSA, Workload Identity)

automountServiceAccountToken.description: Mount the ServiceAccount token in pods

extraEnvFrom.description: Additional environment variables from secrets or configmaps

annotations.description: Service annotations (e.g., for AWS NLB, GCP load balancer configuration)

secretName.description: Name of the TLS secret (optional, auto-generated if empty)

enabled.description: Enable plugin configuration loading via ConfigMap

GUNICORN_WORKERS.description: Number of Gunicorn worker processes (auto = 2*CPU+1, capped at 16)

GUNICORN_MAX_REQUESTS.description: Max requests per worker before restart

GUNICORN_MAX_REQUESTS_JITTER.description: Random jitter to avoid thundering herd

GUNICORN_PRELOAD_APP.description: Preload app code before forking workers

GUNICORN_DEV_MODE.description: Developer mode with hot reload (not for production)

DB_SQLITE_BUSY_TIMEOUT.description: SQLite lock wait timeout in milliseconds

REDIS_MAX_RETRIES.description: Max Redis connection retries at startup (uses exponential backoff with jitter)

REDIS_RETRY_INTERVAL_MS.description: Base retry interval in ms (doubles each attempt)

REDIS_MAX_BACKOFF_SECONDS.description: Max backoff cap in seconds (jitter ±25% applied after)

REDIS_MAX_CONNECTIONS.description: Redis connection pool size per worker

REDIS_SOCKET_TIMEOUT.description: Redis socket read/write timeout in seconds

REDIS_HEALTH_CHECK_INTERVAL.description: Redis health check interval in seconds (0=disabled)

REDIS_DECODE_RESPONSES.description: Return strings instead of bytes from Redis

REDIS_LEADER_TTL.description: Redis leader election TTL in seconds

REDIS_LEADER_HEARTBEAT_INTERVAL.description: Redis leader heartbeat interval in seconds

DB_MAX_RETRIES.description: Max DB connection retries at startup (uses exponential backoff with jitter)

DB_RETRY_INTERVAL_MS.description: Base retry interval in ms (doubles each attempt)

DB_MAX_BACKOFF_SECONDS.description: Max backoff cap in seconds (jitter ±25% applied after)

MCPGATEWAY_UI_AIRGAPPED.description: Enable air-gapped mode for UI assets (serve vendored CSS/JS files locally)

LOG_REQUESTS.description: Enable request payload logging with sensitive data masking

LOG_DETAILED_MAX_BODY_SIZE.description: Maximum request body size to log in detailed mode (bytes)

LOG_DETAILED_SKIP_ENDPOINTS.description: Path prefixes to skip from detailed request logging (comma-separated)

LOG_DETAILED_SAMPLE_RATE.description: Sampling rate for detailed request logging (0.0-1.0)

LOG_RESOLVE_USER_IDENTITY.description: Enable DB lookup for user identity during request logging

FEDERATION_TIMEOUT.description: HTTP timeout in seconds for gateway and MCP server requests (health checks, tool invocations)

GATEWAY_HEALTH_CHECK_TIMEOUT.description: Per-check timeout to bound total time of one gateway health check (seconds)

AUTO_REFRESH_SERVERS.description: Enable automatic tools/prompts/resources refresh from the mcp servers during gateway health checks

TEMPLATES_AUTO_RELOAD.description: Auto-reload Jinja2 templates on change (disable for production performance)

BASIC_AUTH_PASSWORD.description: Basic auth password (when Basic auth is enabled)

API_ALLOW_BASIC_AUTH.description: Enable Basic auth for API endpoints (disabled by default for security)

ED25519_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Ed25519 private key for signing (PEM format)

PREV_ED25519_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Previous Ed25519 private key for key rotation

METRICS_CACHE_ENABLED.description: Enable metrics aggregation query caching (reduces full table scans)

METRICS_CACHE_TTL_SECONDS.description: TTL for cached metrics in seconds (1-300, default: 60)

migrate.default: alembic upgrade head || echo '⚠️ Migration check failed'

backupCompleted.description: Flag to indicate if backup has been completed to prevent re-running

existingSecret.description: Existing Secret name for PgAdmin credentials

minio.description: Configuration for the MinIO S3-compatible object storage.

existingSecret.description: Name of an existing secret for MinIO credentials.

secretName.description: Name of the TLS secret (optional, auto-generated if empty)
